storyInfo: Yato and the Palico discuss their respective opinions on the Rathalos, when the old hunter suddenly becomes enraged and points his hunting spear towards Yato...

attributes.content: Operator Noir Corne, report your status.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I can't reach him... The signal's too weak.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Kashiwau...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I prefer not to shoulder unnecessary burdens while on a mission, so if you can't keep up with my pace, please remain where you are, or return to the camp.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You fool, who said I was travelling with you?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: If you're pursuing the Rathalos, then please don't leave my side without permission. I need to ensure your safety.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You little—
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Palico, keep going.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Mrow, so here's what happened.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: The Hunter I was following had accepted a commission from a member of the Royal Family. They seemed to be in a bad mood, and were looking for a Rathalos Ruby to fashion into a brooch.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: A bad mood... you were hunting a Rathalos on such a whim?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...That client should be just considered an example.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: To return to my main point, I furst spotted this Rathalos in the forest near a volcano.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Right as I was about to catch up to it, I was suddenly swept away by a strange force, and by the time I had made sense of things I was already here.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Do you remember what kind of force it was?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Unfortunately, my... meowmories of it are vague at best.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: A power capable of bringing over a Rathalos could be considered an even greater threat... but in the interest of time, please continue.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I was still extremely unfurmiliar with the environment here when I arrived, so I chose to continue tracking the Rathalos and discreetly observe its behavior.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Based on what I've seen, it started behaving abnormally after it discovered a cave entrance and went inside.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: A cave entrance? Leading into the mountain?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Purrcisely.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Was there anything distinctive about it?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Unfurtunately, it appeared to be a regular cave from what I could tell, but the Rathalos did start behaving strangely after entering.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: I took a cursory stroll inside, only to find...
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: The cave network is purrticularly complex, and my several attempts to locate the Rathalos were all in vain.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: My purrsumption is that it has occupied an area within the cave to build a nest, which should be a wide space near the entrance.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Based on what we saw in the cave behind Roka Village, these caves should all be interconnected, so it's no surprise the Rathalos showed up.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: There's one more thing I'd like to know. As you've seen, our previous fight with the Rathalos was not at all easy. In fact, you could call it... difficult.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We've yet to effectively deal any damage, so I find it hard to be optimistic about our next encounter. I fear we may have to pay a considerable price for victory.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: So what I want to ask... based on your knowledge of the Rathalos, how do we ensure a victory in our next battle?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Or to put it another way, is there any way to improve our chances?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It's hard to judge... Compared to a typical Rathalos, this one is highly agitated and shows a strong tendency to attack at the slightest pawvocation.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Earlier, I noticed that its senses have also improved, which is correlated with a change in its attack patterns. This is the basis for my assumption that its behavior is abnormal... Mrow.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Neither of us have Flash Bombs nor Shock Traps in our pawsernal, so I am at a loss as to how to trap it.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: So you're saying... our chances remain low?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I do have some ideas on how to boost the damage we deal to it, for I have observed... your meowjesty seems to lack instruction on the use of your Dual Blades?
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Dual Blades...you're referring to these strange pair of weapons? True, I do feel a lack of strength behind my blows when wielding them.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: These pair in your paws seem to be weapons from our world, and of extremely good quality... So mew can at least rest assured they were crafted by one of our finest craftsmen.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Is that so...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Mrow?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: I can explain to you the key to using your Dual Blades. If mew can manage to wield them correctly, mew will be able to deal substantially more damage to the Rathalos, but...
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: But?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Before that, my observations have led me to ask the critical question: Is it truly necessary to hunt it?
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: You mean that we shouldn't kill it?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: My understanding is that pawerful Hunters are usually the key to meowntaining a balanced ecology. Hunting of any kind will have an effect, and the consequences must be carefully considered before any action is taken.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: According to my observations so fur, the Rathalos's activity range is quite far from the village, so it does not pose a significant threat to them, and moreover... The ecology of this area seems to be quite unbalanced.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: The area is clearly overpawpulated by herbivores, judging from the obvious damage to the forest vegetation, so the Rathalos's ability to keep the herbivores in check could be considered a pawsitive.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: If I was back in my homeland and had already obtained my commission meowterials, I would not choose to hunt harmless meownsters.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: To be clear, my mission isn't to hunt the Rathalos either, but to deal with another deadly threat—Oripathy. And our current clues point to the Rathalos as the source.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The fate of the monster is irrelevant to me, as long as we can identify the source of the disease and eliminate the threat it poses to the village.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You lot...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: So in order to determine the cause, we must—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You lot!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Your meowjesty?
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Ignore him.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It's all... your fault!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Raises hunting spear)
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Kuso! It's all your fault!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Kashiwau, what are you trying to do?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Why? Why don't any of you listen to me?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Why?! You... You just had to break into the forest and run around like a pack of brainless beasts.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Just look at yourselves, you are powerless before that monster, yet still you want to hinder me, block my way, chase after MY quarry. And still you talk about wanting to protect whatever it is...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: But the truth is, that boy is missing because you didn't listen to me, and that monster is still alive and well!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: We're still in the early stages of figuring out countermeasures, so a failure or two should be unsurprising.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What would you even know? Only trash like you would say it couldn't be done!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: And now you're saying you shouldn't hunt it at all, hiding behind some nonsensical, cowardly excuse? I suppose next you'll even want to rescue it from me, yes?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Now I understand... You're here to torture me, aren't you? To purposely torment me, an old man not long for this world...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: All because I still remember him! Remember the things you lot insist on forgetting! That's why you're torturing me like this!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Just like you did to him! Strip my skin, drain my blood, break my ribs, cut open my chest, extract my marrow...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Well...? Say something!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Sorry, I have no idea where to start with that rant.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Just put down your weapon and let's move on. We don't have the time to waste on irrelevant small talk.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Don't move!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What can you even do?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Begone from my sight! Crawl back to wherever you came from!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm ordering you! Get lost!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Not happening.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I will repeat myself, I have no reason to obey your orders.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Nandayo? Why is this happening again?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Unwilling to listen to even a single word of advice... yet still wanting to protect others?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: With your meager abilities? Self-righteous fool! All you can do is impose your will on others!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: No one needs your protection! Those who take action should suffer the consequences! They deserved what was coming to them!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Everyone else should mind their own business! Fuzakeru na! You should have just stood by and watched!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm the only one... who can hunt that monster... I'm the only one who deserves to...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: If... If you dare take another step forward, I'll have you taste the tip of this spear!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: No, you won't.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You don't have the guts to.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Stop!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What you say means little to me... That hunting spear in your hands... I barely see it as a threat.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: See? I've been approaching you, and yet your spear has not moved an inch.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: This is your last warning!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Just give it up already, you can't do it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Since you insist on delaying my progress, I'll have to settle this with you in a way that will remove the possibility of future interference.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What... Stop!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: If you really walked your talk, you would have disposed of me and Noir Corne while we were wounded, satisfying your desire to have the beast all to yourself. But you didn't.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You... don't come any closer!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I can understand the reluctance to strike at your own kind. Since the beginning I've felt that all your actions were only to dissuade us.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Not long ago, you even pushed me away from the Rathalos... You don't actually want us to be in danger.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Nonsense!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Stop! I'm warning you, this is the last time!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: To return to the subject of hunting, as a hunter, isn't your top priority to eradicate the threat your prey poses at the least possible cost?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And yet, you've been fighting against such a huge predator for so long. Apparently you disagree.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You've consistently refused my offers to work together, insisting on facing it alone despite your lack of ability, in the process putting the safety of the entire village at risk. Which clearly contradicts your attempts to protect us from harm.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm starting to suspect that your Rathalos hunt is nothing more than a personal obsession.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Damare!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Judging at your expression, I must have hit the mark.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Then I take that nothing you've done has actually been to eliminate the threat, but instead you've been blindly chasing it out of anger and remorse.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Which is, in a word, selfish.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The way I see, you're not much of a hunter at all.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That... That was my quarry all along! You're no hunter, so who are you to judge?!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Stop this! Just stop it already!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: If you wish to refute anything I've said, then just thrust forward with that spear of yours and you'll have everything you say you want. It's as simple as that.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm right here, right in front of you.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Come on.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Kill me.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What exactly is source of your obsession, Kashiwau?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Is it Akira Kashiwau?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You... Where did you hear that name?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm guessing that he's not in the village anymore, correct?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What is his relation to you? You share a surname, so clearly more than friends. From the photo he seemed younger than both you and the village headman, as well as a former hunter. His name is also etched onto the hunting spear you're holding.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So, a relative?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Stop talking...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You keep referring to me in the plural. Is it because your image of him overlaps with me somehow?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm guessing that... he once went on a hunt against your advice, leading to irreparable consequences including him leaving you somehow.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Since then, you've regretted your decision and been haunted by the pain... And you can only vent your frustrations on the hunt.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Damare! You... know absolutely nothing...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I think I do, actually.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It can be hard, being caught up in the past, but those emotions will only impair your judgement. Your obsessions will never change the past, but they will keep you from moving forward.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But open your eyes and take a good look. Is this really the time to be rambling about the past to a stranger?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: If you can't bring yourself to kill me, then we should put aside our differences and work together on this hunt.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I still trust you are a somewhat capable hunter, so if you agree I'm willing to put this all behind us.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And we can finally stop wasting time on this sort of nonsense.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: No...you don't know a thing at all...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Akira... is my son...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: He’s already dead.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Seven years ago, on this day, on a night just like tonight, the mountains were filled with the cries of those beasts.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I told him not to go, that those guys were asking for it, but no matter how much I warned him, he just kept saying...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: 'No, I am a hunter of the village.' He just kept saying that, over and over again, before rushing out without looking back.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Later, when I finally saw him again, it was far too late for him to say anything more.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Do you know? If it weren't his clothes and equipment, I wouldn't have recognized him at all.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The sun was shining on his body, and yet his hands were so cold.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I don't understand. My son, how did he end up like that?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I saw them... Ataru Takii... and the backs of those bakayarou...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I just knew it, they were all there when it happened, but they didn't do a thing! They just... watched my son...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: So how... How could you possibly understand my pain...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: (The tip of the spear is trembling so much now, as is his paw...)
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: (His fingers are moving towards, that's... mrow!)
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Careful, your meowjesty! He's about to shoot his spear!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Mroaw! I caught it!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Let go!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I heard the sharp wind in my eardrums as beads of blood dripped down from small scratches on my ear.
The spearhead was stuck by my left foot, and half buried in the ground.
When I turned around, I saw the old man's clouded... shaky eyes.
How... could I...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm fine, calm down...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Stay away!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: No, it wasn't me... It's your own fault...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You! And you! This is all of your fault, all of you!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Kashiwau... agh—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Anguished gasping)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hah, augh, this was... from the Rathalos earlier...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Your meowjesty, what's wrong, why can't you stand? The situation—
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Leave me! After him, Palico!
attributes.name: Yato
